name: Query Monitor bbPress & BuddyPress Conditionals
author: Stephen Edgar

sections.description: Add bbPress and BuddyPress Conditionals to John Blackbourn’s awesome Query Monitor
sections.installation:
Prerequisite

Query Monitor https://wordpress.org/plugins/query-monitor/

Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the \’Add New\’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for \’Query Monitor bbPress & BuddyPress Conditionals\’
  3. Click \’Install Now\’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the \’Add New\’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the \’Upload\’ area
  3. Select query-monitor-bbs-conds.zip from your computer
  4. Click \’Install Now\’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download query-monitor-bbs-conds.zip
  2. Extract the query-monitor-bbs-conds directory to your computer
  3. Upload the query-monitor-bbs-conds directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

short_description: Add bbPress and BuddyPress Conditionals to John Blackbourn's awesome Query Monitor
